docs.lead_paragraph: Call home, check your email, count your sperm: Taiwanese start-up Aidmics is hoping to cash in on the $40 billion global human fertility market with an iPad compatible gadget it calls iSperm.

headline.main: DIY Fertility Testing Goes Digital With Taiwan's iSperm
headline.print_headline: DIY Fertility Testing Goes Digital With Taiwan's iSperm

docs.snippet: Call home, check your email, count your sperm: Taiwanese start-up Aidmics is hoping to cash in on the $40 billion global human fertility market with an iPad compatible gadget it calls iSperm.

docs.lead_paragraph: More than 95 percent of women surveyed in a new U.S. study said they didn't regret having an abortion and felt that the procedure was the right decision for them.

headline.main: Overwhelming Majority of U.S. Women Don't Regret Abortion: Study
headline.print_headline: Overwhelming Majority of U.S. Women Don't Regret Abortion: Study

docs.snippet: More than 95 percent of women surveyed in a new U.S. study said they didn't regret having an abortion and felt that the procedure was the right decision for them.

docs.lead_paragraph: The Fair Employment Project writes that “do no harm” means that doctors need to become aware of the legal ramifications of their notes for patients.

docs.lead_paragraph: As illness patterns worldwide shift toward chronic, multiple ailments, the health system must adapt to keep up.

headline.main: Lives Grow Longer, and Health Care’s Challenges Change

headline.main: Mothers Helping Mothers to Live With H.I.V.

docs.abstract: In Africa, H.I.V.-positive women effectively mentor frightened new patients about how to face the disease and prevent transmission to their babies.
docs.snippet: In Africa, H.I.V.-positive women effectively mentor frightened new patients about how to face the disease and prevent transmission to their babies.

docs.lead_paragraph: Three deep-conditioning options to tame and hydrate hair without weighing down the strands.
docs.abstract: Bee Shapiro lists several hair masks that successfully hydrate locks without weighing them down.

docs.lead_paragraph: Former President Jimmy Carter on Wednesday backed a historic deal to curb Iran's nuclear program, telling The Associated Press that the U.S.-led agreement is "a major step in the right direction."

headline.main: Former US President Jimmy Carter on Iran, Confederate Flag
headline.print_headline: Former US President Jimmy Carter on Iran, Confederate Flag

docs.lead_paragraph: Burkina Faso's presidential candidates must commit to tackling forced and early marriage and improving access to contraception, sex education and health services for women and girls ahead of elections in October, a rights group said on Wednesday.

headline.main: Burkina Faso Presidential Hopefuls Urged to Tackle Early, Forced Marriage
headline.print_headline: Burkina Faso Presidential Hopefuls Urged to Tackle Early, Forced Marriage

docs.snippet: Burkina Faso's presidential candidates must commit to tackling forced and early marriage and improving access to contraception, sex education and health services for women and girls ahead of elections in October, a rights group said on Wednesday.

docs.lead_paragraph: Child marriage is widely accepted in Brazil, where girls seek older husbands to escape from sexual and other violence in the home, or because of teenage pregnancies or the lack of job opportunities, according to new research.

headline.main: Child Marriage Accepted in Brazil to Escape Abuse at Home: Researchers
headline.print_headline: Child Marriage Accepted in Brazil to Escape Abuse at Home: Researchers

docs.snippet: Child marriage is widely accepted in Brazil, where girls seek older husbands to escape from sexual and other violence in the home, or because of teenage pregnancies or the lack of job opportunities, according to new research.
